page.title: 01So. Shields-Great North Run
page.content: The Great North Run One of the major events in South Shields is the annual half-marathon,The Great North Run.The event has become of major sporting significance with international competition and a staggering annual entry of over 25,000 people. The latter part of the run is in South Shields, namely along{John Reid} road,past the{Nook}shopping centre,and up Prince Edward road to the coast.The final gruelling mile is along the { {Leas}area and the finishing line is at {Gypsies Green} stadium. Many celebrities take part in the run.Perhaps{Jimmy Saville}is the most recognisable regular competitor but local heroes from the {Sunderland}and {Newcastle}soccer clubs add spice to the occasion.
